ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of ANN MCCAIN EVANS, C.M., of St. Andrews, New Brunswick, to be a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as an ad hoc provincial member of the Independent Advisory Board for Senate Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year.
